title: Contemporary Diamond Kangan - Gold Bangles
materials: Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (Vajraalu). Hallmarked for purity. Features a fine Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: A modern interpretation of the classic Kangan. The bangle features a unique zig-zag design, accented with clusters of sparkling diamonds set in a shared prong setting. This creates a delicate yet sturdy design suitable for everyday wear. The streamlined silhouette blends seamlessly with both traditional and contemporary attire.
occasions: and as a modern touch to traditional attire during festivals like Sankranthi or Diwali. A perfect gift for the modern Telugu woman.
description: This Kangan pair offers a refreshing take on traditional South Indian jewelry. The combination of lustrous gold and dazzling diamonds ensures elegance and sophistication. Lightweight and comfortable, these bangles can be worn daily. Excellent craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and durability.
